title: Trial Marriage
overview: Out of commercial interests, two real estate leaders, Guling Xie, the head of Dingzhuang Group, and Ye Cheng Shu, the puppet president of Future Group, decided to get engaged for 99 days. Soon their relationship warmed up, but due to constant setups and accidents, the couple broke up. However, Cheng Shu decided to get his wife back.
